line.comment: * This script only runs at gamestart.
* "Welcome onboard!"
* display subtitle text: text='Please do not save your game while the galaxy is being generated.' duration=900000 ms
* Make sure the galaxy is loaded and inventory set before going on.
* Prologue.
* Variables that need to be initialized only once.
* SWM3 Diplo system
* SWM3 v1.6
* Gate collision checks. For performance reason, the galaxy generator does not do it, so we do it here.
* Sometimes mines collide with each other because asteroids are too close from each other.
* display subtitle text: text='You can now save your game.' duration=5000 ms
*add pirates to blacklist SWM3 v1.6
* Check if the .cat are properly installed.

line.text: 'Файлы '10.cat' и '10.dat' не совпадают с файлами, используемыми в Mayhem 3. Пожалуйста, убедитесь, что мод установлен правильно.'

line.comment: * Set the gamestart (credits are used to identify the gamestart). 0 shouldn't happen.
* $gamestart = [PLAYERSHIP]-> get amount of ware {Credits (WARE_CREDITS_UNUSED)} in cargo bay
* if not $gamestart
* $t = 'The current gamestart is not recognized. Mayhem 3 can only be played via the Game Creator.'
* = [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.SendMessage' : message=$t log=[TRUE] forceDisplay=[TRUE] delayMs=0 author=null
* display info box: text= '', icon= 0, timeout= 0, fadeout= 0
* return null
* end
* set global variable: name='mayhem_gamestart' value=$gamestart
* $gamestart = $gamestart * -1
* = [PLAYERSHIP]-> add $gamestart units of {Credits (WARE_CREDITS_UNUSED)}
* $playerRace = [PLAYERSHIP]-> get maker race
* Prologue specials.
* Unlock the Trade Report menu on PLAYERHIP.
* Create a ship of each race to update the reputation menu.

sval.val: Подготовка галактики...
Галактика успешно сгенерирована.
Файлы '10.cat' и '10.dat' не совпадают с файлами, используемыми в Mayhem 3. Пожалуйста, убедитесь, что мод установлен правильно.
(Независимые)
(Терракорп)
This script only runs at gamestart.
"Welcome onboard!"
display subtitle text: text='Please do not save your game while the galaxy is being generated.' duration=900000 ms
Make sure the galaxy is loaded and inventory set before going on.
Variables that need to be initialized only once.
SWM3 Diplo system
SWM3 v1.6
Gate collision checks. For performance reason, the galaxy generator does not do it, so we do it here.
Sometimes mines collide with each other because asteroids are too close from each other.
display subtitle text: text='You can now save your game.' duration=5000 ms
add pirates to blacklist SWM3 v1.6
Check if the .cat are properly installed.
Set the gamestart (credits are used to identify the gamestart). 0 shouldn't happen.
$gamestart = [PLAYERSHIP]-> get amount of ware {Credits (WARE_CREDITS_UNUSED)} in cargo bay
if not $gamestart
$t = 'The current gamestart is not recognized. Mayhem 3 can only be played via the Game Creator.'
= [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.SendMessage' : message=$t log=[TRUE] forceDisplay=[TRUE] delayMs=0 author=null
display info box: text= '', icon= 0, timeout= 0, fadeout= 0
return null
set global variable: name='mayhem_gamestart' value=$gamestart
$gamestart = $gamestart * -1
= [PLAYERSHIP]-> add $gamestart units of {Credits (WARE_CREDITS_UNUSED)}
$playerRace = [PLAYERSHIP]-> get maker race
Prologue specials.
Unlock the Trade Report menu on PLAYERHIP.
Create a ship of each race to update the reputation menu.
